species.name: stakataka
descriptions: It appeared from an Ultra Wormhole. Each one appears to be made up of many life-forms stacked one on top of each other.
When stone walls started moving and attacking, the brute’s true identity was this mysterious life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.

abilities.name: beast-boost
abilities.effect: Raises this Pokémon's highest stat by one stage when it faints another Pokémon.
